com.ikarus.solartaxi

Class TaxiBattery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikarus.solartaxi.TaxiBattery

  • public class TaxiBattery
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a chargeable battery.
    Author:
    Sebastian Kirchner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaxiBattery()
      Constructor setting maxCapacity and currCapacity to 100.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drain()
      Drain the battery, checks that current charge can't go under 0
      void drain(double percentage)
      Drain the battery off a certain percentage
      double getLoadPercentage() 
      void recharge()
      Recharges the battery, checks that current capacity can't go over maxCapacity
      void recharge(double percentage)
      Recharges the battery, checks that current capacity can't go over maxCapacity
      void setNewMax(double new_max)
      Resets the maximum capacity of the battery and also sets the current charge to maximum capacity.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaxiBattery

        public TaxiBattery()
        Constructor setting maxCapacity and currCapacity to 100. For different maxCapacity use method 'setNewMax(float new_max)'

    • Method Detail

      • drain

        public void drain()
        Drain the battery, checks that current charge can't go under 0

      • drain

        public void drain(double percentage)
        Drain the battery off a certain percentage
        Parameters:
        percentage - of charge that should be drained (e.g. 0.2 = 20% => - 20%)

      • getLoadPercentage

        public double getLoadPercentage()
        Returns:
        double value representing the current percentage of charging (0-1)

      • recharge

        public void recharge()
        Recharges the battery, checks that current capacity can't go over maxCapacity

      • recharge

        public void recharge(double percentage)
        Recharges the battery, checks that current capacity can't go over maxCapacity

      • setNewMax

        public void setNewMax(double new_max)
        Resets the maximum capacity of the battery and also sets the current charge to maximum capacity.
        Parameters:
        new_max - value that will be the new maximum capacity
